meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking competitiveness.
meanings.sent1: The uncompetitivenesses of the team led to their defeat in the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The uncompetitivenesses of the market made it difficult for new businesses to thrive.
meanings.sent3: The uncompetitivenesses of the turtle race made it more of a leisurely stroll.
meanings.sent4: The uncompetitivenesses of the garden snail race was evident as they barely moved.
meanings.sent5: The uncompetitivenesses of the sloth in the race was comically slow.

meanings.sent1: The uncompetitivenesses of the company resulted in loss of customers.
meanings.sent2: The uncompetitivenesses of the industry led to a decline in innovation.
meanings.sent3: The uncompetitivenesses of the potato sack race made it more about laughter than speed.
meanings.sent4: The uncompetitivenesses of the snails in the race highlighted their relaxed nature.
meanings.sent5: The uncompetitivenesses of the sleepy cat in the race was endearing to watch.
